Literature.Title: Design, Synthesis, and Nanostructure-Dependent Antibacterial Activity of Cationic Peptide Amphiphiles.
Literature.Author: Rodrigues de Almeida N, Han Y, Perez J, Kirkpatrick S, Wang Y, Sheridan MC

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Staphylococcus aureus JE2(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus LAC(MIC=>32µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 43300(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli K-12(MIC=>32µg/ml),Escherichia coli ATCC 25922(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa PAO1(MIC=>32µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 27853(MIC=>32µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC 700603(MIC=>32µg/ml),Acinetobacter baumannii ATCC 19606(MIC=>32µg/ml),Candida albicans ATCC 90028(MIC=>32µg/ml),Cryptococcus neoformans var. grubii H99(MIC=>32µg/ml)
